title: With FRIENDS Like These, Who Needs ENEMIES
body_text:
Fitzpatrick, Herrera Center Stage at 123!
The marvel of the ten event showdowns, the glowing pageantry of the annual Christmas gatherings, the heated competitions between long-standing rivals, the jubilance, excitement, and pure adrenaline rush to simply showcase one's talents ... Dodgeball, where virtual unknowns have transformed into a unified family, never to dissolve.
The forthcoming encounter between two beloved superstars entails all of that. The powerhouse
Kevin Fitzpatrick
, the speedy catching-machine
Lenny Herrera
have figuratively signed the contract to partake in this 123rd extravaganza.
But what exactly does make this match so momentous?
Good question!
It was this time last year, deadsmack in the middle of a fantastically joyous Winter '07, where DODGEBALL 123 found its captains. Fitzpatrick and Herrera, two men with perhaps little in common, shook hands agreeing to this one time only confrontation - of course only IF the aging sport could make it this far.
Now a year later, it might be a great opportunity to sit back and reflect for a moment or two. You're perhaps puzzled by the question, "Geez, where'd all the time go!?"
All of those Saturdays, all 122, have not gone to waste have they. Let's hope not!
When approaching the hallowed, heavenly grounds of Wall High School, why not smell the roses. Why not give thanks to not only those who paved the way for a future, but a pat on one's own shoulder as well.
To think that it's 2008 is truly remarkable. And so
EastCoastDodgeball
proudly presents in a very meaningful one-on-one match-up,
Kevin Fitzpatrick
versus
Lenny Herrera
on January 26, 2008. Come on out and experience for yourself why life is worth every second if you want it to be.
REMINDER!
DODGEBALL 123 will be the only chance to vote in the DODGEBALL 124 "Secret Selection", so make sure you attend! Get all the details live on January 26 at 123!
Choices
: Classic Two Team -- Two Team Prison Ball -- Two Team BoxBall -- Four Team "Risk"
body_html:
Fitzpatrick, Herrera Center Stage at 123!
The marvel of the ten event showdowns, the glowing pageantry of the annual Christmas gatherings, the heated competitions between long-standing rivals, the jubilance, excitement, and pure adrenaline rush to simply showcase one's talents ... Dodgeball, where virtual unknowns have transformed into a unified family, never to dissolve.

The forthcoming encounter between two beloved superstars entails all of that. The powerhouse Kevin Fitzpatrick, the speedy catching-machine Lenny Herrera have figuratively signed the contract to partake in this 123rd extravaganza. But what exactly does make this match so momentous?

Good question!

It was this time last year, deadsmack in the middle of a fantastically joyous Winter '07, where DODGEBALL 123 found its captains. Fitzpatrick and Herrera, two men with perhaps little in common, shook hands agreeing to this one time only confrontation - of course only IF the aging sport could make it this far.

Now a year later, it might be a great opportunity to sit back and reflect for a moment or two. You're perhaps puzzled by the question, "Geez, where'd all the time go!?"

All of those Saturdays, all 122, have not gone to waste have they. Let's hope not!

When approaching the hallowed, heavenly grounds of Wall High School, why not smell the roses. Why not give thanks to not only those who paved the way for a future, but a pat on one's own shoulder as well.

To think that it's 2008 is truly remarkable. And so EastCoastDodgeball proudly presents in a very meaningful one-on-one match-up, Kevin Fitzpatrick versus Lenny Herrera on January 26, 2008. Come on out and experience for yourself why life is worth every second if you want it to be.

REMINDER!
DODGEBALL 123 will be the only chance to vote in the DODGEBALL 124 "Secret Selection", so make sure you attend! Get all the details live on January 26 at 123!
Choices: Classic Two Team -- Two Team Prison Ball -- Two Team BoxBall -- Four Team "Risk"
